name: Juca Being (EBE) captive in Brazil
description: This is sad Juca. A poor beign captive in Brazil, Maranhao State, Tasso Fragoso City. This poor creature saw his brothers being killed. Then he was captured and taken to a farm in the city of Uberlândia. This is a photo from poor Juca's record series in Uberlândia, before being taken to the military base and hidden in an underground facility after an unsuccessful rescue attempt. Juca was kept there for six months before being taken to another place, a Faraday cage specially built for him, in order to avoid the emission of KU banded implants. With great difficulty, he learned to speak, without needing telepathy. A video from Juca can be seen on Youtube looking for "Captive Gray".
